text: Cheungbeia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Cheungbeia include: * Cheungbeia kawamurai (Habe & Kosuge, 1966) * Cheungbeia laterculata (G. B. Sowerby II, 1870) * Cheungbeia mindanensis (Smith E. A., 1877) * Cheungbeia robusta (Hinds, 1843) ==References== ;Notes ;Bibliography * Taylor J.D. & Wells F.E. (1994). A revision of the crassispirine gastropods from Hong Kong (Gastropoda: Turridae). In: B. Morton (ed.) The malacofauna of Hong Kong and southern China III . Proceedings of the Third International workshop on the malacofauna of Hong Kong and Southern China. 101-116. ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Cheungbeia
